using VM = {VMNamespace};

{
    public static class {ModelType}Extensions
    {
        public static VM.{ModelType} ToVm(this DOMAIN.{ModelType} model)
        {
            return AwAgentConnectMapper.Map<DOMAIN.{ModelType}, VM.{ModelType}>(model);
        }

        public static List<VM.{ModelType}> ToVm(this List<DOMAIN.{ModelType}> model)
        {
            return AwAgentConnectMapper.Map<List<DOMAIN.{ModelType}>, List<VM.{ModelType}>>(model);
        }

        public static void DefineMappings()
        {
